name: Infratoad
description:
Winter is coming! Keep your Toad King form freeing by binging him insects to eat. The more it eats, the more its croak will be deep and powerful, and will melt the ice around.

This is a single player or two player co-op game.

CONTROLS: Gamepads

You can use game pads for one or both players:
Left analog - to move
A - to break ice blocks and feed the toad king
X - to capture insects

Player 1, keyboard

W, A, S, D - to move
J - to break ice blocks and feed the toad king
K - to capture insects

Player 2, keyboard

Arrow keys - move Right Shift - break ice blocks and feed the toad king Space: - capture insects
